markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Steal the Sky](/Feats.aspx?ID=2202) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 225, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Jalmeri Heavenseeker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=198)

**Prerequisites**
[Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2198)

</column>

---

You can take away the air that keeps a flying foe aloft. You gain the [_steal the sky_](/Spells.aspx?ID=825) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Steal the Sky
